Class
Description
AddAppointmentsController
This class allows the functionality of the 'addAppointment.fxml'.

This class will allow the functionality of 'addCustomer.fxml'

this is the appointment model class.
AppointmentsController
This is the appointmentController.
AttemptsCounter
this is the method that will increase the count for the amount of attempts the user took to login
Contacts
this will create the class for contacts.
Country
this is the country class.
Customer
this will create the class for customers.
CustomersController
This is the customerController.
DAOappointments
this method connects to JDBC and access the 'appointments' table
DAOContacts
this method connects to JDBC and access the 'contacts' table
DAOCountries
this class connects to JDBC and access the 'countries' table
DAOcustomers
this class connects to JDBC and access the 'appointments' table

this class connects to JDBC and access the 'appointments' table
DAOUsers
this method will connect to JDBC and get all rows from users

this is the first level divsions class.
JDBC
this is the class that will open and close the connection with the database
LoginAlert
this is the lamba expression interface that will allow program to display the alert when user successfully logs in
LogInFormController
this is the class that initializes and provides functionality to the login screen
Main
This class creates the login screen that the user will interact

this class will make the reportsController and give it functionality to 'reports.fxml
